description: Ms. codex. Title from spine and edges. Physical description: 18 lines per page; written in naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication. Mild insect damage. Origin: Ramaḍān 1246 H [February-March 1831] (leaf 282a).
author: Muḥaqqiq al-Thānī, ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥusayn, 1463 or 1464-1533 or 1534
abstract: Part of a commentary on Ibn al-Muṭahhar al-Ḥillī's Qawāʻid al-aḥkām fī maʻrifat al-ḥalāl wa-al-ḥarām.
extent: 282 leaves : paper ; 212 x 149 (147 x 88) mm bound to 213 x 152 mm

title.@value: جامع المقاصد : من السكنى الى آخر الوصية.
